selections.name: Love Cloud
selections.reason: Resumes after a long spell but showed immense potential on debut with a 2nd placing. Ideal race to kick off and looks the class runner.

selections.name: Fairy Maia
selections.reason: Form is hard to fault with a solid 2nd last start at this track. Drawn the inside alley and will be competitive.

selections.name: Sunrise Jade
selections.reason: Resuming here. Has won previously fresh and looks a key runner based on prior form.

danger_horse.name: Arch Flight
danger_horse.reason: Second run back and expecting improvement. Among the better chances.

selections.name: State Of Rock
selections.reason: Raced on speed and boxed on steadily for 3rd last start. Likely to kick on following that outing.

selections.name: Strong Freja
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed previously first up and looks a key runner in this field.

selections.name: General Cheetah
selections.reason: Cannot be ruled out despite a plain effort last time. Previous form suggests competitiveness.

danger_horse.name: Bambi Chan
danger_horse.reason: Resuming after a break. Should be ready to run well fresh.

selections.name: Rairai Rakuraku
selections.reason: First-starter by Happy Sprint. Comment suggests she is sure to be well fancied.

selections.name: Gut Shot
selections.reason: First-starter by Danon Smash. Can make an immediate impact on debut.

selections.name: Kaito Lust
selections.reason: First-starter by Bago. Noted as a key runner likely to measure up.

danger_horse.name: Espiegle
danger_horse.reason: Watch for a positive market push on this first-starter.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Box Quinella 4,5,6; Watch market moves closely.

selections.name: Signed Piece
selections.reason: Showed ability with a 2nd on debut at big odds. Solid 5th last start. Sure to be about the money.

selections.name: Chuo Sky
selections.reason: Watch for him flashing home late. Recent efforts suggest he is close.

selections.name: Golden Queen
selections.reason: Cannot be ruled out despite a lacklustre effort last time. Capable of better.

danger_horse.name: Le Matin Elegant
danger_horse.reason: Needs to improve but has place claims in this field.

selections.name: Bago Rio
selections.reason: Satisfactory effort on debut and can go on with it now. Top selection.

selections.name: A's Inferno
selections.reason: Second-up. Don't underestimate after a fair return.

selections.name: Ivy Marengo
selections.reason: Satisfactory effort on debut. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Fuzzy Angel
danger_horse.reason: Better than recent moderate performance suggests.

selections.name: Vulture Star
selections.reason: Dominant winner by 6 lengths last start. Improver with winning prospects.

selections.name: Batistuta
selections.reason: Won last start at this track. Expected to perform well again.

selections.name: Meisho Suehiro
selections.reason: Narrowly missed last start (2nd). Top chance again.

danger_horse.name: Positano
danger_horse.reason: Chance with the aid of an inside gate.

selections.name: Dupuy De Lome
selections.reason: Scored a big 7 len win at this track last start. Improver with winning prospects.

selections.name: Elepaio
selections.reason: Tracked speed and boxed on steadily for 2nd last start. Strong winning chance.

selections.name: Tendre Reve
selections.reason: Resuming winner. Could prove too smart for these.

danger_horse.name: Proud Mary
danger_horse.reason: Racing well recently. Will be hard to hold out.

selections.name: Vogue Altair
selections.reason: Won by 1.3 len last start. Hard to beat again.

selections.name: Scintillio
selections.reason: Rolled along in front and edged out for 2nd last start. Worth following.

selections.name: Sound Lux
selections.reason: Well placed to take this out after a solid 3rd last start.

danger_horse.name: Majesty Rule
danger_horse.reason: Draws the fence but needs to improve on recent form.

selections.name: Kotorino Saezuri
selections.reason: Won by 1.3 len last start. Leading contender coming out of a very nice stall.

selections.name: Ad Libitum
selections.reason: Scored a big 3.5 len win last start. Should prove hard to beat.

selections.name: Charisma Ethos
selections.reason: Well placed and sure to prove tough to beat.

danger_horse.name: Eiko Kaiser
danger_horse.reason: Can turn things around based on best form.

selections.name: Longing Time
selections.reason: Won by 1.75 len last start. Hard to beat again.

selections.name: Nishiken Saku
selections.reason: Impressed last start with a win. In the mix again.

selections.name: Keiai Elnath
selections.reason: Form hard to fault. Low draw and expected to go well.

selections.name: Mut Kurve
selections.reason: Progressing well with a 2nd last start. A win is on the cards.

selections.name: Bless Word
selections.reason: Resuming. Won previous preparation first up. Excellent chance.

selections.name: Ken Atlas
selections.reason: Held ground to the line for 2nd last start. Has the ability to take this out.

danger_horse.name: Bishamonten
danger_horse.reason: Capable of a big finish so don't write him off.

selections.name: Gloriosa
selections.reason: Won by a neck last start. Possesses a big finish.

selections.name: Three Kings
selections.reason: Resuming. Winning hope in a suitable contest.

selections.name: Bonny Majesty
selections.reason: Has won previously when first up. Could prove too smart for these.

danger_horse.name: Transient
danger_horse.reason: Not far away of late. Worth including.
